sentences.en: At dawn, the breach was closed at last.
sentences.cn: 黎明的时候, 破洞终于合拢了.

sentences.en: Four men were found guilty of breach of the peace.
sentences.cn: 四名男子被判扰乱治安罪名成立。

sentences.en: He admitted causing a breach of the peace.
He was sued for breach of contract.
sentences.cn: 他因不履行合同而被起诉.

sentences.en: He was technically in breach of contract.
sentences.cn: 严格按照法律条文来讲,他是违约了.

sentences.en: He was the first to mount the breach in the city wall.
She wanted to help heal the breach between them.
sentences.cn: 她想帮助他们修复破裂的关系。

sentences.en: Telling the story was a flagrant breach of trust.
sentences.cn: 说谎是一种可耻的破坏信誉的行为.

sentences.en: The bomber had breached security by hurling his dynamite from a roof overlooking the building.
sentences.cn: 爆破手从一个俯瞰这幢楼房的屋顶上投掷了炸药,攻破了安全防卫。

sentences.en: The company accused him of breaching his contract.
The company has been served with a writ for breach of contract.
sentences.cn: 这家公司因违约已接到法院令状。

sentences.en: The congressman was accused of a breach of secrecy rules.
sentences.cn: 这位议员被控违反了保密规定。

sentences.en: Their actions threatened a serious breach in relations between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 他们的行动使两国关系面临严重恶化的危险。

sentences.en: They have a case against their directors for breach of fiduciary duty.
sentences.cn: 他们掌握了足够的证据控告董事违犯信托责任。

sentences.en: to sue sb for breach of contract
We won't have any breach of discipline.
sentences.cn: 我们不允许任何破坏纪律的现象.

sentences.en: Whenever there is danger, he always stands in the breach.
sentences.cn: 每逢遇到危险, 他总是首当其冲.
